column1: I love the new design of your website!
The product quality has decreased over time.
Customer service was not helpful when I had an issue.
The delivery was fast, and I'm happy with the service!
The app is a bit slow at times, but overall it's great.
I'm dissatisfied with the response time to my query.
The prices are too high compared to the competitors.
Had an issue with my order, but it was resolved quickly.
